document_data.name: Thurruvyn Alastrarra
document_data.mainbody: '''Thurruvyn Alastrarra''' was an ancestor of the [[Alastrarra]] house of [[Cormanthyr]] by the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Legacy: On the year {{yearlink|241}}, [[Naeryndam Alastrarra]] named Thurruvyn's honor as a reason to respect [[Elminster]]'s claim to the protection of [[Coronal]] [[Eltargrim]]'s law, opposing the wishes of his house in doing so.
